name: Pet Pop Escape - Free funny matching puzzle game with cute animal star emoji
name_original: Pet Pop Escape - Free funny matching puzzle game with cute animal star emoji
description:
Help pet escapes by pop them up, We have to pop them. Of course they should have the same color and at least 2 of them which stick together. Go Help them!!!

- Buy once play all (No In-App Purchases)

- Infinity game levels

- Easy to play

- Funny Pets pop game

- Good For all people
